Class LLRailRoadServiceException

          • com.lucaslouca.service.LLRailRoadServiceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LLRailRoadServiceException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    RuntimeException that is thrown when an error occurs during a request to the LLRailRoadService. An example would be, requesting the shortest path to a town where a route does not exist.
